title: Los Dias y Las Noches de Monsigñor Martinez
description: A former cop becomes a Catholic priest and mercenary.
altHero: Monsigñor Martinez wearing sunglasses and pointing two guns
alt1: Monsigñor Martinez baptizes twin babies in a church
alt2: Monsigñor Martinez smiles from the electric chair
alt3: Monsigñor Martinez holds up a mask of his face he’s removed from an unconscious man
alt4: Monsigñor Martinez in a wedding dress points a gun at another man
